"I was going to chase it until it went in the hoop, he said. Off the backboard, through the rim, then the net. It was halftime. It was over. The BBC's political correspondent Mike Sergeant said Mr Andy Coulson had become a powerful political insider- precisely because he had a feel for the world outside Westminster and the PM would be looking for a "someone with similar nous and journalistic experience" .
